## Block.setTooltip() method

Sets the tooltip for this block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setTooltip(newTip: Tooltip.TipInfo): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newTip | [Tooltip.TipInfo](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.tipinfo_typealias.md) | The text for the tooltip, a function that returns the text for the tooltip, or a parent object whose tooltip will be used. To not display a tooltip pass the empty string. |

**Returns:**

void
